issue.title: [CF 289] Edgecounter refreshes, duration does not.
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1.  Make Inquisition as a shown Buff for TellMeWhen
2.  Enable Timer
I suppose it to happen with any playerside refreshable Buff

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

When I hit Inquisition it shows the remaining Duration and a clockwise running edgecounter.
When I hit Inq. again before the duration is over only the edgecounter refreshes but the duration does not.
The duration only refrehes after the timer has run out.
I guess it's some kind of problem with a refreshing buff.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.5.5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Sorry got no Error as there is no real error because things happen but not as expected.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ashtara | Imported from CurseForge issue #289 | Raw

comments.body:
1. Please do not ignore the instructions at the top of the defect ticket template.
  2. The textual countdowns on top of icons are not provided by TMW. They are provided by OmniCC/tullacc. If the actual cooldown sweep animation is refreshing, then TMW has done its job, and it is up to these addons to properly update the text.
  3. I guess it goes without saying, but I am unable to reproduce this.

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
